data.title: An Evening of Improv with Colin Mochrie and Debra McGrath
data.text:
Famed dynamic duo of improv, Colin Mochrie and Debra McGrath are bringing their customized, quick-witted, and uproariously entertaining show to Kelowna for one night only! This show is guaranteed to have you in stitches, and will prove why—when it comes to improv—it’s “best to say yes". Experience an evening of comedy brilliance as the acclaimed improv duo, Colin Mochrie (Whose Line is it anyway?) and Deb McGrath (Little Mosque on the Prairie), take the stage. With their quick wit, unmatched chemistry, and hilarious improv skills they are guaranteed to leave you roaring with laughter as an audience member, or possibly as a participant onstage! Colin Mochrie, the celebrated Canadian comedian and improv actor, has captured the hearts of audiences far and wide with his unparalleled wit and comedic genius. Best known for his role as a regular cast member on the improv comedy show Whose Line Is It Anyway? and is widely considered to be one of the leading improvisers in the world. In 2013, Colin Mochrie was named Canadian Comedy Person of the Year at the Canadian Comedy Awards. Colin also spent two seasons as a cast member on popular CBC satirical television series This Hour Has 22 Minutes and has been involved in numerous other television shows, both in North America and beyond, including Supertown Challenge and CBC’s Blackfly. While Deb McGrath started her career as a member of the Toronto Second City, she has become a familiar 3 name in Canadian film and television due to her numerous appearances in various TV shows and movies. McGrath is the creator of the Women Fully Clothed comedy troupe.

Pricing

Regular CA $75.50 ($65.00 + $2.10 CIF + $8.40 Ticketing Fee)All above prices include GST.
